> [[ 74 ]]

"You're actually still alive?" You hear Anaximander from somewhere nearby. "Well, not for long!"

The feeling is coming back to your arms and legs. You're scared. You don't know how much HP you have left.

From somewhere below, you hear a faint, unfamiliar whining sound.

> Spend 1 EXP on HP.
> Use Celestial Gem to fully restore HP.
> Yell really loudly while you fall.
